Articles.Content:
Hello! after my recent mods I'm feeling confident in Blender. So I'd like to try and make a command pod for ground vehicles, so I was thinking of making a truck cab.

The issue is, I don't see any tutorials, and those command pods available with .Dae files do not have hatch, ladders, or portraits ingame as far as I am aware.

I'd like some advice on how this can be implemented, and if it can't be done with blender, then how can it be done with something like Unity, for example.

same problem, im making a pod for space planes. i have tryd to make the internals for the iva and portraits. hatches and ladders are well documented on the wiki: http://kspwiki.nexisonline.net/wiki/Adding_Airlocks_and_Ladders_to_Parts
ok i made a decent pod with internal. the unity project can be downloaded in my tread
